source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_00<tab>The Crystal Exarch is eager for you to meet with Alisaie.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_00<tab>星見の間の水晶公は、アリゼーに会う方法を教えてくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_01<tab>In order to facilitate your reunion with Alisaie─and hopefully soothe any lingering anger from her ill-timed summoning─the Exarch offers to arrange transportation for the journey to Amh Araeng. He hands you a letter of introduction, and sends you to the Amaro Launch to find a man named Cassard.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_01<tab>水晶公から、アム・アレーンへの行き方を教えてもらった。クリスタリウムのアマロ桟橋にいる「カサード」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6E01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_02<tab>After reading the Exarch's missive, the merchant seems more than happy to act as your guide. You have only to give the signal to begin your trek into the desert.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_02<tab>カサードに封書を渡した。出発の準備を整えて、再度アマロ桟橋にいる「カサード」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_03<tab>You indicate your readiness to depart, and Cassard ushers you onto the back of one of the waiting amaro.

※From this point onwards, you may secure passage to the lands of Amh Araeng with a word to the adroit amaro tamer.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_03<tab>カサードと話し、アム・アレーンに向かうことになった。以後、アマロ桟橋の「熟練のアマロ使い」と話すことで、アム・アレーンに行けるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_04<tab>You have arrived in Amh Araeng. Cassard awaits to escort you deeper into the desert.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_04<tab>アム・アレーンに到着した。隊商の野営地の「カサード」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_05<tab>The merchant bids you follow him to the southwest, and you duly set off into the sands, doing your best not to get left behind.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_05<tab>カサードとともに出発することになった。吊り橋付近にいる「カサード」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_06<tab>A short while later, Cassard signals for a brief stop, apparently unwilling to cross the bridge before you've properly appreciated the majesty of the scene you're leaving behind.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_06<tab>カサードと話した。付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAAF201 /var>」で見渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_07<tab>You dutifully admire the imposing edifice of Qasr Sharl until your guide deems your eyes to have feasted enough─whereupon he prods you to press on with your journey.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_07<tab>カスール・シャルを臨んだ。アム・アレーンのモルド・スーク付近にいる「カサード」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_08<tab>Upon arriving in Mord Souq, Cassard welcomes you with obvious enthusiasm, declaring his love for the place in the same breath. Judging by the grin on the merchant's face, your visit here promises to be an interesting one...
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SEQ_08<tab>カサードと話した。ここが、モルド・スークのようだ。砂に埋もれたアム・アレーンで、これからどんな冒険が待ち受けているのだろうか。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the sealed missive to Cassard at the Amaro Launch.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_TODO_00<tab>アマロ桟橋のカサードに封書を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_MYSTERYVOICE_000_000<tab>Ready to depart for Amh Araeng? Alisaie will be overjoyed to see you safe─I know she was particularly concerned for your well-being.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_MYSTERYVOICE_000_000<tab>アリゼーに会いに行くのだな。
彼女はとくにあなたを案じていたから、再会を喜ぶだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_MYSTERYVOICE_000_001<tab>She, uh...<var 1A 02 /var>impressed upon me<var 1A 01 /var> how regrettable the timing of her summoning was. Repeatedly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_MYSTERYVOICE_000_001<tab>いや……もとはといえば、私が彼女を、
最悪のタイミングで喚んでしまったせいなのだが……。
それについては、もうたくさん怒られたので許してほしい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_MYSTERYVOICE_000_002<tab>I only hope that my part in sending you to her will garner me some measure of forgiveness. Here. This is a letter of introduction addressed to a man named Cassard, the master of a merchant caravan.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_MYSTERYVOICE_000_002<tab>彼女のいる「アム・アレーン」に出入りしている隊商あてに、
紹介状をしたためておいた。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_MYSTERYVOICE_000_003<tab>There are few who know the ways of the desert as well as he does. Find him at the Amaro Launch, and he will see that you reach your destination.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_MYSTERYVOICE_000_003<tab>ミーン工芸館の近くにある「アマロ桟橋」に行って、
隊長の「カサード」に、それを渡すんだ。
きっとアリゼーの待つ地へと導いてくれるだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_010<tab>Hm? If you've come looking for work, I might have a spot for another guard─
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_010<tab>おっ？　見ない顔だな。
もしかして、うちの隊商に入りたいのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_011<tab>Oh. Oh! A friend of the Exarch! Hoping to meet someone in Amh Araeng, are you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_011<tab>なんだ、公の客人かよ！
……ふむふむ、アム・アレーンにいる仲間に会いに行きたいと。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_012<tab>Then I shall be your guide! I was about to set off for our outpost there, as a matter of fact, so we can leave right away─assuming you have everything you need?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_012<tab>そういうことなら、任せときな！
ちょうど次の仕入れのために、あっちにいく予定だったんだ。
一緒に乗せてってやるから、準備ができたら声をかけてくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_013<tab>All set? Then off to the unforgiving sands we go!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_013<tab>おっ、準備ができたんだな？
それじゃあ、過酷な砂漠の旅にご案内といくか！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>You can now travel to Amh Araeng! Speak with the adroit amaro tamer to fly to the desert.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>「アム・アレーン」に旅立つことができるようになりました！
以後、アマロ桟橋の「熟練のアマロ使い」と話すことで、
移動することができます。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>You can also use your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>aether compass<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to assist with locating aether currents in new regions. The aether compass can be found under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>また、新たなフィールドの「風脈の泉」は、
だいじなもの「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8BDE01 /var>」を用いて、
近くのものを探知することができます。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_030<tab>Oof, no matter how many times I come here, the <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((cold)) ((heat)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((heat)) ((cold)) /var>)) /var> never fails to catch me off guard! <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((The sky may be as bright as in the scorching hours of day)) ((Don't be surprised when the temperature drops at night, though─the sky is still bright, of course)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Don't be surprised when the temperature drops at night, though─the sky is still bright, of course)) ((The sky may be as bright as in the scorching hours of day)) /var>)) /var>, but it gets brisk enough to make you shiver.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_030<tab>く～っ、やっぱりこっちの気候は厳しいな！
天を光が覆おうが、昼は暑く、夜寒いのが荒野ってもんだ。
お前も、対策はしっかりしておけよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_031<tab>Now, the Exarch's letter said I was to take you to the Inn at Journey's Head, which is where this Alisaie friend of yours is staying.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_031<tab>さて……水晶公からの紹介状によると、
お前をアリゼーがいる「旅立ちの宿」って場所まで、
連れて行ってほしいそうなんだが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_032<tab>But that's a fair old distance. So I propose we make a stop in Mord Souq to break up the trek─allowing me to attend to some business, and you to enjoy the local hospitality. Sound good? Good!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_032<tab>あそこは、ちっと遠くてな。
まずは手前にある「モルド・スーク」って集落を目指そう。
俺が仕事ついでに案内してやるよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_033<tab>All right, you lot! I'm off, and I'd better not see the goods covered in sand when I get back!
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_033<tab>じゃ、お前ら、ここは任せるぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_034<tab>Right, we head southwest, straight as an arrow!
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_034<tab>よぉし、まずは南西に向かって直進だ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_040<tab>Stop here a moment. This is your first visit to Amh Araeng, is it not?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_040<tab>ちょいと待った。
お前は、はじめてアム・アレーンに来るんだったよな？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_041<tab>Before you cross the River of Sand, you need to turn around and feast your eyes on <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_041<tab>なら、「砂の川」を渡る前に、
そこでちょっと振り返ってみろよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_045<tab>Go on, take a look! We're not moving until you appreciate the majesty of that edifice!
target: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_045<tab>ほら、そこでちょっと振り返ってみろよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_050<tab>They built them big, didn't they? That's Qasr Sharl, a fortress meant to protect the northern reaches of Nabaath Areng.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_050<tab>……でっかいだろ？
ここらにまだ「ナバスアレン」って国があったころの城、
北方を守護する「カスール・シャル」さ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_051<tab>Seeing what was left behind, I believe it when they say that it was once one of Norvrandt's mightiest nations.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_051<tab>これほどの城を造れるくらいだ、
ナバスアレンは、ノルヴラント有数の大国だったらしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_052<tab>...At least until the Flood came along. Great chunks of Nabaath Areng's lands were lost to the Light, its great city included. The few who survived didn't see much point in staying. Most of them, anyway.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_052<tab>が、「光の氾濫」によって、
首都を含めた領土のほとんどが消失……。
わずかに生き残った連中も、概ねよそに身を寄せた。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_053<tab>No, not many choose to come here these days, not with everything in ruins. Even that hulking great fortress has become little more than an amaro roost for me and my caravan.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_053<tab>今じゃもう、国はおろか、好き好んで来る奴もいない。
あの立派な城でさえ、俺たち隊商のアマロ留ってわけさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_054<tab>But not everywhere is as deserted as this place. Just wait until you see Mord Souq...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_054<tab>でもま、何事にも例外はあるだろ？
これから行く「モルド・スーク」は、まさにそんな場所だから、
少しは楽しみにしてるといいさ。

TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_055<tab>……それじゃ、再出発だ！
ここから、さらに南西へ進むぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_060<tab>Here we are─Mord Souq! By the blessed shadow, I love this town!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA301_03291_CASSARD_000_060<tab>よし、到着っ！
ここがひとまずの目的地、モルド・スークだ！
